choose.when: FID, FDICT_TYPE, FDICT_CODE, FDICT_VALUE, FPARENT_CODE, FLVALUE, FRVALUE, FLEVEL, FSUBNUM, FORDER, FENABLE, FAUDIT_STATE, FDELETE_STATE, FEDIT_STATE, FAUDITOR_ID, FAUDIT_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FDELETOR_ID, FDELETE_TIME, FEDITOR_ID, FEDIT_TIME, FREMARK

mapper.select:
select
from ect_dict
order by
${item.field}
desc
mapper.delete: delete from ect_dict where FID in (#{listItem})
mapper.insert: insert into ect_dict (FID, FDICT_TYPE, FDICT_CODE, FDICT_VALUE, FPARENT_CODE, FLVALUE, FRVALUE, FLEVEL, FSUBNUM, FORDER, FENABLE, FAUDIT_STATE, FDELETE_STATE, FEDIT_STATE, FAUDITOR_ID, FAUDIT_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FDELETOR_ID, FDELETE_TIME, FEDITOR_ID, FEDIT_TIME, FREMARK ) values ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enable, jdbcType=BIT}, #{auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update ect_dict
FDICT_TYPE = #{data.dictType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
